      • normalizeScore

        @Deprecated
public static double normalizeScore(double score)
        Deprecated. 
        The following produces the right half of a sigmoid curve adjusted so that f(0) = 0; f(inf) = 100; f(x>0) > 0
        Parameters:
        score - from 0 to inf
        Returns:
        score from 0 to 100
